sqlMap.select: Select t.NOTE_ID, t.APP_ID, t.NOTE_TYP, t.NOTE_TITLE, t.SEND_BEGIN_TIME, t.SEND_END_TIME, t.IMP_FLG, t.CREATE_TIME, t.UPDATE_TIME, t.AUDITOR_ID, t.AUDIT_INFO, t.AUDIT_TIME, t.AUDIT_STATUS, t.OPER_ID, t.NOTE_STATUS From ${schema.configPlat}.ARES_NOTE t Where t.NOTE_STATUS = '0' and t.AUDIT_STATUS = '1' and t.SEND_BEGIN_TIME <= sysdate and (t.SEND_END_TIME >= sysdate or t.SEND_END_TIME is null)
sqlMap.update: Update ${schema.configPlat}.ARES_NOTE Set NOTE_STATUS = '1', UPDATE_TIME = #UPDATE_TIME# Where NOTE_ID = #NOTE_ID#
sqlMap.select: select m.* from (select a.*, ROWNUM as rno from (Select t.* From ${schema.configPlat}.ARES_NOTE t Where t.APP_ID = #APP_ID# AND t.NOTE_STATUS = '1' AND t.AUDIT_STATUS = '1' Order by t.UPDATE_TIME desc ) a where ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# ) m where m.rno > #firstIndex#
Select t.* From ${schema.configPlat}.ARES_NOTE t Where t.NOTE_ID = #NOTE_ID#
